data.persona: I tend to the grounds around the castle. I grow food for consumption by the nobles. My hands are callused and worn from my work.
data.description:
You are in the Reception area.
The building itself is ordinary in appearance and is somewhat foreboding.  It is surrounding by a dense fog and high grass.  Sometimes, one can hear whispers in the wind.
There's a The building, a the wind, a high grass, an old bicycle, a tree, a dense fog, a Alter, a graveyard, and a coffin here.
The zombies and the a royal are here.

You are carrying a hoe for digging and an sleeping bag.
data.goal: give hoe for digging to a royal

data.short_motivation: I want the royal to follow me to the graveyard
data.mid_motivation: I want to bury the zombie today
data.long_motivation: I hope the kingdom wins the war with the zombies in the coming weeks
